author: chfast
content: Do you need help with updating BLS tests?

author: marioevz
content: A PR for https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8945 in EELS and another one in EEST is absolutely welcome ðŸ˜„

author: chfast
content: Ok, can I start with EEST first?

author: marioevz
content: We are adding a generic precompile absence check test in this PR, so we should be covered in case someone forgets to remove the precompile from their implementation: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1036

author: marioevz
content: So it's only a matter of removing the precompile checks and tests

author: chfast
content: Great. But we don't have to remove the tests: you can redirect all MUL tests to MSM precompiles... (and potentially find and remove duplicates)

author: marioevz
content: I'll be merging https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1032 in a little bit, which directly affects BLS tests

author: chfast
content:
Ok, my commitment for tomorrow:
1. Implement gas changes in evmone.
2. Check https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1032.
3. Remove MUL in EEST.

The EELS change can be done in parallel
